source.30791030:
# Interactive Sanddance Visualisations in Kaggle Kernels 

Microsoft recentlhy opensourced their Sanddancelibrary which is used in Tableau. This is just a sample demonstration of how powerful the library is and how it helps Web developers in the JS world to work with powerful data visualization tools. The example demonstrates the visualization of the infamous titanic survivor's dataset!
